wikipedia_page.main: John Chester (born 25 October 1935) is a British rower. He competed in the men's eight event at the 1960 Summer Olympics.

link_mentions.page: Great Britain at the 1960 Summer Olympics

response: John Chester may also refer to:
*John Chester (Connecticut soldier) (1749–1809), militia officer and public official
*John Chester (university president) (1785–1829), president of Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute
